original_text: Saul's uncle said to him and to his servant, “Where did you go?” And he said, “To seek the donkeys. And when we saw they were not to be found, we went to Samuel.”
korean_text: 사울의 숙부가 사울과 그의 사환에게 이르되 너희가 어디로 갔더냐 사울이 이르되 암나귀들을 찾다가 찾지 못하므로 사무엘에게 갔었나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Saul's uncle said to him and to his servant,
sentences.korean_translation: 사울의 삼촌이 그와 그의 종에게 말하기를,

sentences.original_text: And when we saw they were not to be found,
